Reviews.Title: “Small rooms. Good facilities. Great Location.”
Reviews.Author: Joseph C
Reviews.Content: dilemma booking review stated stayed alot budget boutique hotel probably trust photos web shown deluxe twin standard basically consist space wall bathroom glass sticking edge bed 2 single bed theres 50cm space im shopping space main concern im happy choose tripthe hotel safety box hair dryer bedroom slippers except iron wardrobe design modern 42 lcd tv hd super sharp definitely location 2min walk mtr 5 mins temple street 8mins walk ladies street lotsa eateries hotel nathan rd hesitate book hotel visit hk
